info.name: LMS API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for the Learning Management System

request.description: Optional: quiz_slug, per_page, page, date_filter, start_date, end_date, search, status_filter
Required: attempt_id OR attempt_slug. Optional: team_user_slug
Optional: id (course), slug, team_user_slug, per_page, page, sort_by (newest|oldest|highest_rating|lowest_rating)
Course must be soft-deleted first. Permanently removes from DB.
